subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Danilo Di Luca finished third in Stage 17, which was held in his home region of Abruzzo, an area hit by a massive earthquake last month.
snippet: Danilo Di Luca finished third in Stage 17, which was held in his home region of Abruzzo, an area hit by a massive earthquake last month.
